title: Fully Furnished- 1 BR/BA - Utilities, Internet & Cable Included!
posting_body: FULLY FURNISHED - 1 Bedroom/1 Bathroom (825 sq ft) - The Keys Condominiums
$2,800/month - INCLUDES ALL UTILITIES, HIGH SPEED INTERNET & BASIC CABLE TV
The Keys is conveniently located near the 680 and 24 freeways, Walnut Creek and Pleasant Hill BART stations and downtown Walnut Creek.
The property offers 21 acres of lush landscaping with a lake, ponds, streams, bridges, waterfalls and fountains.
-gym with locker rooms including showers, whirlpool tubs, dry sauna and steam room
-clubhouse with a full kitchen for social events, includes a community lounge area with a big screen TV, worktables, free wi-fi, pool tables, ping pong, board games and a library
-3 private gate entrances to the Iron Horse Trail
-825 square feet, upgraded and modern looking
-California King Sized Bed, 3 seater recliner couch and 1 seater recliner
-TVs in the bedroom and living room
-1 assigned garaged parking space, plenty of guest parking
